summary: Core domain logic for the Master Clash backend.

subdirectories.workflow: LangGraph state machines defining Agent behaviors.
subdirectories.services: Wrappers for external APIs (OpenAI, Gemini, Kling, etc.).
subdirectories.tools: Standalone functions exposed to LLMs as tools.
subdirectories.loro_sync: Python client for interacting with the Loro Sync Server.

key_files.models.py: Shared Pydantic models used across modules.

architecture_notes: Follows a hexagonal-ish architecture: API -> Workflow -> Tools/Services -> External World.
